content: Head in the opposite direction and go underneath the bridge to loop back around to the right, and the first set of stairs now. Deal with the guard there, before proceeding up them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rakshasa Palace'.
The content is as follows:
Head in the opposite direction and go underneath the bridge to loop back around to the right, and the first set of stairs now. Deal with the guard there, before proceeding up them.
